alert.note: Alert for Ness; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:25PM CDT until June 29 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Ness County in west central Kansas... Western Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bazine, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Alexander around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include McCracken, Nekoma, Hargrave and La Crosse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
